home.introduction:
Hello! I'm a frontend developer from Korea.
I've learned a lot through open source and love contributing back to it.
I'm interested in various fields, including backend, networking, and system programming.
about.title: Using Technology to Solve Creative Problems
about.description:
I specialize in developing scalable and high-performance frontend projects, from small websites to large applications.
While I mainly use Angular and React, I prefer to choose the most efficient technology for solving problems.
I love giving back to open source as much as I've learned from it, and I'm involved in various projects.
about.contact_me: If you need to contact me, please email me at winetree94@gmail.com.
about.profile.description: I go by the nickname winetree94 online. Here are the platforms where I'm active.
about.qualifications.description: I handle frontend projects from start to finish, utilizing optimal technology stacks tailored to different business environments, from On-Premise to PaaS and SaaS.
about.qualifications.frontend.1: Design and development of web applications (CRA/SSG/SSR) based on Angular/React
about.qualifications.frontend.2: Project design and development based on ECMAScript / DOM API
about.qualifications.frontend.3: Development of CommonJS / ES Module libraries
about.qualifications.frontend.4: Operation of modern web bundlers like Webpack / Vite
about.qualifications.others.1: Building and optimizing cloud deployment systems on platforms like Cloudflare / AWS / Azure
about.qualifications.others.2: Building and managing container deployment systems with Docker
about.experience.swit.title: Swit
about.experience.swit.activity.1: Lead developer of a cross-platform (Web, iOS, Android) text editor library
about.experience.swit.activity.2: Lead developer of a cross-platform (Web, iOS, Android) integrated authentication solution
about.experience.swit.activity.3: Lead developer of the design system
about.experience.swit.activity.4: Built a multilingual support system based on ICU MessageFormat
about.experience.swit.activity.5: Renewed and optimized the performance of the task management system
about.experience.epapyrus.title: Epapyrus
about.experience.epapyrus.activity.2: Developed PKI/TSI certified electronic signature services
about.experience.playauto.title: Playauto
about.experience.playauto.activity.1: Full-stack development of the global shopping mall integration service 'PA Global'
about.experience.playauto.activity.2: Developed a data table library to efficiently render large volumes of data
about.experience.playauto.activity.3: Integrated backends of multiple international shopping malls like eBay, Shopee, Lazada
about.experience.playauto.activity.4: Developed a multi-framework architecture for technology replacement
about.experience.jdlab.title: JD Lab
about.experience.jdlab.activity.1: Developed the 'Exim' Android app and backend for rehabilitation services
about.experience.jdlab.activity.2: Full-stack development of the clothing accessory sales web service 'Bupasa'
